short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your own selfies as emoticons! Create your Mycons at http://mycons-rdtest.rhcloud.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring awesomeness to your Facebook chats and be the talk of the town.

It's simple - easily capture your images using the awesome image capture and edit tools at http://mycons-rdtest.rhcloud.com to create your emoticons (the starter pack has 5 commonly used free emoticons. The ability to create more will be added soon.

This extension will add a small 'my' icon in your Facebook chat box. Use the button to add mycons to your Facebook chats.

As this is an early stage release, I'm very receptive to feedback - feel free to post a message at https://www.facebook.com/pages/Mycons/260241570835995 and I'll reply ASAP!
